title: Kenwyne Jones
summary: Kenwyne Joel Jones CM (born 5 October 1984) is a Trinidadian retired professional footballer who played as a forward. He began his football career with Joe Public in his native Trinidad and Tobago. He moved to W Connection in 2002,[3] and he was a utility player in the Trinidad and Tobago team in 2003 against Finland. In 2004, he joined Southampton, where he was converted to a striker.[4] He was later loaned to Sheffield Wednesday and Stoke City during the 2004â€“05 season.
